data.eml:eml: A taxonomic study of the genus Metiochodes Chopard from China (Orthoptera, Gryllidae, Trigonidiinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Kai, He, Zhuqing, Liu, Xianwei (2010): A taxonomic study of the genus Metiochodes Chopard from China (Orthoptera, Gryllidae, Trigonidiinae). Zootaxa 2506: 43-50, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.195925
